website_summaries.verdict: Another good choice if you're looking for a natural product, but it's not tear-free.
pros: Made from natural ingredients safe for sensitive skin
cons: Despite tear-free label, it may still burn your eyes

website_summaries.verdict: Combining science and nature, this natural, clinical-grade baby wash is formulated by a team of doctors to gently and safely cleanse delicate skin.
pros: Hypoallergenic formula is made from premium plant- and mineral-based ingredients, including pink grapefruit essential oils and Himalayan pink sea salt
Suitable for eczema, cradle cap, and sensitive skin
Free from harmful chemicals and irritants
Thick consistency works up a foamy lather
Natural fragrance smells fresh and clean

customer_reviews.title: Dark and Gross discoloration.  Poor Company Response.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was happy with this product but the bottle developed very dark reddish to black discoloration in and around the pump. I contacted the company because it looks like mold to me. They are claiming it’s oxidation and suggested I clean my pump. It seems much to dark for oxidation, and it looks unhealthy and disgusting. I spent way too much for them to not stand behind their products. I do NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caused red bumps....
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product! It's a great price and they hit all my favorite buzz words plus they're cruelty free. For a month my son had red bumps under his eyes, getting progressively worse. They'd fade come bedtime, we'd do our nightly bath and then in the morning they'd be even worse. This went on for a month before my husband realized it coincided with when we started using the shampoo. So I stopped. The bumps went away!!! I didn't use this soap for 5 days and all 5 days, no bumps. I used it again on the 6 day and my son's bumps are back, so it's for sure the shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely gentle! Wonderful smell!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a shampoo for myself (I have slightly thinning hair and only in my late 20s and thought my old cheaply made shampoo may be the culprit with such harsh ingredients). I really love how clean and soft this makes my hair feel and it smells amazing with the grapefruit essential oil. I also use this as a face and body wash...which I never thought something that would make my hair feel so good actually make my skin feel clean too but it really does! I now use it on my 4 year old son as well and he loves it too. I will be using this for both of us from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Causes itchy skin
customer_reviews.text: We had to return this after it made my 3-year-old daugher very itchy. She doesn't even have particularly sensitive skin - never had this problem with other soaps. I didn't believe it was the soap at first because it's supposedly so natural - I thought maybe it was the heat drying her skin out (since it's winter). But we tested it by switching back to our old soap for a week (no itch) and then reintroducing Puracy, and the itch came right back. Can't recommend, and I like and use Puracy for our cleaning products.
customer_reviews.author: Briana P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has severe eczema and contact dermatitis. Pretty much anything and everything under the sun makes her skin irritated. Puracy has an unscented lotion that actually works really well for her, which is why I gave the wash a chance. Unfortunately, I believe the fragrance, although natural, resulted in increased irritation. This has happened with other natural body washes though that have natural scents. On that note, their customer service was really receptive to my concerns and they even asked questions to make their product better. I hope they come out with an unscented wash, similar to the Aquaphor and Eucerin baby washes because I will buy it in a minute!
customer_reviews.author: Julya

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative to Mustela
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has eczema and this body wash / shampoo has worked wonders. I was looking for an alternative to the Mustela I was using prior. I like the Mustela but I don't like that it doesn't really lather up and it is quite pricey. When I first got the Puracy I was worried about the scent. After using it for a few it has really grown on me and it doesn't linger on my babies body. I add a few pumps to the water as well to soothe her skin. I love this product and will be ordering again once we run out! Thanks for creating a product that is natural and affordable!
customer_reviews.author: MaineChe

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hyperkeratosis!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for this baby soap!!! My son is 5 and has hyperkeratosis. He has little bumps all over his face, arms, and legs. His dermatologist told me that he has prescribe all the creams in the world but I need a soap without all the harsh detergents in it. I’ve tried everything! Aveno, baby dove, organic soaps. Nothing has worked. After trying this soap he cleared up in 3 days. I’m going to repeat myself.. 3... days!! What!?!? Amazing!! I will buy this again and again!!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Very good cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed with puracy product range and have had a good experience overall. I bought this since my child has very sensitive skin and the usual baby shampoos cause tiny heat acne. This cleanser is doing a decent job in not aggravating her skin but I had very high hopes that her skin would improve greatly which isn’t really the case. Still looking out for the mildest skin friendly cleanser. The positive is that it suits normal skin really well.
customer_reviews.author: Zhill

customer_reviews.title: Mild but effective for adult hair & body
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something milder than typical hair and body wash to reduce dry scalp and skin, and to reduce stress on my hair, which is thinning. This does the trick. It seems much milder than other shampoos (I had been using an Old Spice product, which I really liked), without that sensation of strong detergent and skin dryness. There is zero residue after rinsing. Also smells nice. The squirt nozzle is a nice bonus, very easy to use with the bottle on a shelf in the shower. I have no idea why some complain about eye irritation, as this seems very mild.
customer_reviews.author: H. A. Newness

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: Used it tonight first time baby is 5 months old. Broke out in a rash screaming when washed her hair: eyes were burning though I protect them now all red. Used Johnson baby wash up until tonight with no issues
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my eight month old bc an alternate “organic” brand kept drying out my baby’s skin. But we didn’t have that problem with Puracy! It smells good, yet subtle. The only con we had, if you could even call it that, was it’s not tear free as it advertises. A small soapy amount splashed in my baby’s eyes and her eye got a bit irritated. (But I don’t think any soap is actually tear free) Highly recommend for anyone with allergies, sensitive skin, or just wanting a healthy plant based soap for their young one
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've had seborrheic dermatitis for about a decade. Painful itch, no plaques. Have tried everything from prescription shampoos, OTC, homemade, essential oils, you name it. Kept looking for a shampoo that would control the itch and have found it in Puracy baby shampoo. I've used it for a week and have no itch. I wash my hair, leave the shampoo on while I take the rest of my shower. My hair looks great, I'm not itchy and finally have relief. I also like the conditioner. It's light and provides just enough moisturizing to allow me to style my hair without tangles. Really happy with these products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted it to work, and reading so many good reviews I thought it would be excellent but this product (I don't know if it was the body wash or lotion that caused this, 'cuz I bathed her and then used the lotion) gave her a terrible allergic attack on my 2-month-old baby I thought everything was fine, but 20-30 minutes later she got exaggeratedly bad, reddened her whole body and she began to despair so much that even vomit, I felt the worst mother in the world for cause her such a bad time
customer_reviews.author: P. Medina

customer_reviews.title: Dries out my baby’s skin
customer_reviews.text: I really really wanted to like this product because it was affordable for having “natural ingredients”. As it turns out, other reviews were correct. My baby’s skin dried out with this product. Her hair felt brittle and dry as well. I tried another product (Mustela) and it worked wonders to my baby’s skin and hair so I know now that it wasn’t just all products hat made her skin and hair dry it was this specific product.
customer_reviews.author: zoeyzoey

customer_reviews.title: Best product for babies and adults! Safe and natural
customer_reviews.text: Realized I’ve never left a review for this! This is the only product I’ve used on my (now 4yo) daughters hair (along with their conditioner) and she’s never had issues with her skin or with greasy hair. I even started using it on my own hair, and realized it wasn’t getting as greasy between washes! I use this in my daughters bath because it doesn’t have soap and won’t cause irritation or increase her risk for a UTI.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Greasy hair, itchy scalp.
customer_reviews.text: I used two pumps of shampoo the first time, and my hard was noticeably greasy... basically right away. I figured I didn’t use enough (it barely lathers) so I used three pumps the next time. Same greasy hair, and my head was itchy. I tried it twice more (using more shampoo for good measure) and the end result was always greasy hair. To make things worse, the back and sides of my neck broke out! Obviously not the product for me. :(
customer_reviews.author: sassy senorita

customer_reviews.title: Good product, horrible packaging, neither pump worked.
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived, there was leaked product everywhere. At least 1/4 of both bottles was on the outside of the bottle or the packaging. When we took the bottles out and attempted to screw on the pump part, we discovered neither pump worked. While the actual product idles its job, smells nice and doesnt dry out our little ones skin, we are forced to use the screw on lid which is super inconvenient when bathing an infant. The pump is a large portion of the reason I purchased this item so I'm extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Clark

customer_reviews.title: "Baby" Shampoo and Body Wash?
customer_reviews.text: This bodywash and shampoo combo is great for even my sensitive skin.... I know it says its a "baby" product. Possibly the company is missing out on sales due to the name... food for thought. It smells good, does the job, and isn't harsh. One flaw I found out was, since I keep it in the shower, water leaks into the bottle through the pump part. Hence watered down soap. Maybe good or bad deciding if you want to stretch it out or not lol.. I think I prefer not but others.. who knows
customer_reviews.author: sweet7reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great and is also mild.
customer_reviews.text: To my surprise this really cleans well! I use it as a shampoo and body wash. My hair behaves better and doesn't need washed as often. My scalp feels different too. Hard to explain but cleaner not waxy? My husband even noticed my hair was shiny. It cleans my body really well too (without burning). I'm not a baby but a senior citizen who is so happy to have finally found a product that works for me!
customer_reviews.author: 1995shopper

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My son is actually 6 yrs old, but he uses this as it's very gentle. He says he likes it very much and it never stinks his eyes. I like the natural ingredients...so a definite keeper. Update: my son is now 8 yrs old and while we still enjoy the product for his body, not so much the shampoo. It leaves his hair clean, but the scent is not very nice now. I'm not sure why it changed for him, but he agrees that we'll use a different shampoo and then either this or the kids body wash from puracy. I think this truly is an ideal product for babies and the little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Meatballs Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, nice ingredients, but a little drying .
customer_reviews.text: This soap has a really nice scent and is super mild. A little goes a long way too which is helpful when you have two kids to wash. I gave four stars though because it seems to be a little drying on the skin. It’s no big deal for my four year old but is a little too much for my newborn. I will probably switch to a more moisturizing brand when we run out of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor K.

customer_reviews.title: Multi use - a small amount goes a long way...
customer_reviews.text: Multi use product. While I am no baby, I love this for face wash, shampoo and body wash all in one. I am in love with the beautiful subtle citrus scent and how it lathers. Only need a little bit, as it goes a long way and leaves my hair squeaky clean and my body moisturized! This is a wonderful product and I will buy more. PS. I was NOT paid or solicited to say these things. They are my true feelings...buy this. You will not be sorry..🙂
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Patti

customer_reviews.title: ... use this as a bodywash for myself and I love it! It rinses quickly and cleanly and leaves ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a bodywash for myself and I love it! It rinses quickly and cleanly and leaves no residue. It has a nice soft scent, nothing overpowering. Plus I like the natural ingredients! I tried it as a shampoo, but it left my hair too dry. I have caramel colored highlights (bleaching process) in my hair and that may help to contribute to the drying effect. I'll just continue to use it solely as a body wash - Highly recommend for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Aquamarine

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to add 1/2 tsp to 8 ounces of saline solution for my NeilMed nasal flush. The shampoo breaks down mucus in the sinus and flushes out thick mucus that does not come out with saline alone. I am hoping that with regular usage I can prevent mucus buildup and relieve my chronic sinus infections. Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried sooo many different baby shampoos through the years. This one is my favorite. It lathers really well, which isn’t the case with many natural baby shampoos. I notice that it doesn’t dry my hands like some. Many non-natural shampoos give my kids rashes and we have not had any trouble this shampoo. It is also tear free. I don’t have a single complaint!
customer_reviews.author: T. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Fixed the - "Not Tear Free" Issues
customer_reviews.text: It Smells fine and I like the ingredients but it's not tear free. All three of my kids were screaming throughout the bath because of bubbles in their eyes. Maybe if we only use it as a shampoo but it clearly says bubble bath and tear free. Not great. Update- The new formula is so much better. No tears here. Thanks for fixing the issues.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: No tears, no struggles, no fussing!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot speak enough about this baby shampoo/body wash ! I have tried many baby shampoos on my 21 month year old toddler and I have found that although some are good in general, barely any of them are truly tear-free, except for this one! So in addition to using this during bath time, I also use this to wash my baby's face daily. And he doesn't mind at all. No tears, no struggles, no fussing! It is really amazing since we have never achieved that with any other product. And makes him smell all fresh and clean after a full day at the daycare. Love that it is all natural too.
customer_reviews.author: Andy S.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great !!
customer_reviews.text: I have really sensitive skin . My feet and hands crack open . I'm always looking for a body wash / shampoo that's sulfate free , vegan and easy on my sensitive dry skin as they proclaim it is .I'm not saying this heals my cracked feet and hands completely but it doesn't aggravate them and make it worse like so many soaps do .This soap is definitely easy on my skin. I love it , well should I say my skin loves it . Plus what a good value . You get two large bottles with pumps . Doesn't take much either so it last a long time . Very happy and will be purchasing again .
customer_reviews.author: Esduckie

customer_reviews.title: Yes and Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: First off it’s natural! Second, it has a pump! Having kids in the tub while trying to clean and bathe them, it’s a pain in the donkey to use bottles with no pump! With the pump, I am able to quickly get a squeeze out and get back to those squirmy snot worms. Before that, it was bottle in hand, trying to grip the bottle, trying to squeeze the bottle, bottle slipping out of hand, bottle spilling and when squeezing the bottle, you always get more or less than you need. Thank you for the pump and thank you for the natural ingredients that make me and my kids happy!
customer_reviews.author: Vsyan2418

customer_reviews.title: So sad they each arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Great product for baby and I’ve used this on my newborn who is now almost a year old. A little goes a long way and the scent is soft. Seems to not aggravate her eyes when taking a bath. Unfortunately all 4 bottles received were leaking so I can’t use as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product was delivered quickly - I'm glad there is an image posted on how to operate ...
customer_reviews.text: We were originally using Aveeno Baby Wash & Shampoo; unfortunately our 9 month always ended up with rashes and would not stop scratching himself after baths. In search of a more natural product, I found Puracy and decided to give it a try based on the reviews, and beneficial environmental/community impact. Product was delivered quickly - I'm glad there is an image posted on how to operate the pump because the wife was having some difficulties getting it to work right out of the box. After a couple days of use, we are happy that the baby is no longer scratching himself after a bath. Based on this experience, we are also purchasing the organic lotion to try.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with Puracy Natural Baby Shampoo and Body Wash
customer_reviews.text: The baby shampoo arrived as promised. My granddaughter is 14 months old. We've washed her with Puracy since she was 6 weeks old and have been very pleased...no rash, it rinses easily, and does a good job. Previously we used a different product that caused her to break out. We also use it on my 5-year-old grandson. The bottles are a good size and the price is very reasonable. We order more each time we start to run low. Looks like I'm going to have to place another order much sooner than I expected. My 5-year-old grandson used 1/2 bottle while making "bad guy soup," which will "keep bad guys away." LOL!
customer_reviews.author: LRB

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE Puracy! I care a lot about the products I am putting on my baby & toddler. We were using Burt's Bees but it just wasn't giving me the sudsy bubbles that I wanted. After reading all the wonderful reviews, I decided to try it. I LOVE it. It suds up better, cleans well, is gentle, and smells good too! and the best part is, IT IS SAFE and natural! I will gift this at baby showers to come. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole123

customer_reviews.title: It burned my baby's eyes 😫😫
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo burned my baby's eyes😥!! I tried it on my face with my eyes open and my eyes became red. I really reject for not trying it before. Babies don't know that they have to close their eyes. No matter how careful you are, it's gonna end up in their eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Mmo

customer_reviews.title: Why rated so high??
customer_reviews.text: It made my 1.5 year old sons skin and hair so dry. So dry, his hair color faded. I also have been using this as body wash do myself, but it made my skin so dry and uncomfortable, we had to stop using. Worst body wash I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Not for my baby; worked for me
customer_reviews.text: As it turns out, my baby girl has very sensitive eczema skin. This shampoo and body wash did nothing for her itchy skin and dried out her scalp. Only a few days after usage and she developed bad dandruff. Was a no-go for her. I decided to use it during my second pregnancy as to not waste and i really like it! Cleans by hair and body and feels nice. Might try it on baby #2
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 61 year old woman who suddenly developed severe contact dermatitis. I was allergic to ALL of the organic, non allergenic products I was using so I decided to try Puracy. This stuff is amazing! I use it as both shampoo and body wash and even carry a small bottle in my purse as hand soap. I also use their laundry detergent which is awesome as well. As long as I strictly use these products and stray away from all others, I have no skin issues! I would highly recommend all the Puracy products to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Mallott

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: We love this shampoo/ body wash for our 4 kids, even our 7 year old with thick hair. the only reason i didn't give it a 5 star is because, out of the 2 bottles, at least one of the caps dispensers (not what they're called) isn't working. It either doesn't pop up so we can pump soap or the head falls off. It's not a huge deal since we usually just use the pump from a previous empty bottle but it's pretty annoying. And they break pretty easily. If i drop the shampoo into the shower the cap usually breaks off. But as a liquid the soap is great
customer_reviews.author: Noor Mubarak

customer_reviews.title: It has been a good shampoo and wash so far
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a few times, but so far it has been a great shampoo and body wash. 1. It has a pleasant scent when lathering on, but does not leave a perfume-like smell once rinsed. 2. You only need to use a small amount (penny sized is what I've been using) and it soaps up really well. 3. My baby seems to have sensitive skin which is why I wanted to try a more natural soap. He has not had any signs of problems with this shampoo and wash so far.
customer_reviews.author: L. Goodall

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended for atopic skins
customer_reviews.text: my son has atopic skin and this product is amazing. i have tried a lot of brands with him: Avene, Babe, Aveeno, Eucerin, and nothing seems to work with him, i give it a try with this product based on the reviews and it was incredible how his skin was smoother within a week and love the smell too. ----update---- I love the products! it makes my children skin softer, but as a frequently buyer and to contribute to the environment, I wish you could have the refill option for the baby shampoo and body wash. I hope you can evaluate that
customer_reviews.author: michelle brown

customer_reviews.title: Too hyped up
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo/body wash is ok. I decided to try it becausecase it has really good reviews, but after using it for about a month in my opinion it's hyped up too much. It smells really good but the scent does not last (you can't smell it after you get out the shower). It is also a little on the watery side. It's just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Sela

customer_reviews.title: Best product we have found for our sensitive skinned child
customer_reviews.text: The bath wash is wonderful. It has a very mild smell and has worked so well when most others have failed on our sensitive child. We will be using this from now on and plan to continue using it for baby dos. Can't wait to try more product from this company! (The only reason I question durability is we have had a couple of the pumps break when the product falls. Good thing is, they send two with the purchase!)
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Love their baby shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I love how the products are all natural! Purchased because after looking into how TERRIBLE some of the other brand-name kids and baby shampoos are, I wanted to give this a try. My toddler has very bad skin rashes and bad reactions to almost every other product we've tried in the bath. With Puracy, she had no bad reactions. I loved how gentle it is on my kids skins; yet gets them clean!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Puracy Products are Rated Highly for a Reason. Give them a try!
customer_reviews.text: All of Puracy's products work extremely well. As someone who spends a lot of time trying to find products that won't irritate my sensitive skin, take my word. This stuff is good for almost any skin type or condition. With only one use, I've managed to convert a few people to this and other products by Puracy. My only wish, is that the company consider offering trial sizes. While it may add to the overall cost, I would have switched to their products much sooner if I didn't have to commit to ordering a full size bottle just to try it. NOTE: I Have Not received any discount or free product for this review.
customer_reviews.author: LFV

customer_reviews.title: Good but... Not tear free
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my toddler's hair so soft! But it bothers his eyes...So I'm not sure it's tear free. Really disappointing since comparing to Aveeno soothing wash, hair feels so good. We just started using it and noticed he fuses when it gets in his eyes. I haven't personally had a chance to test it on myself. So not sure if we'll continue to use on him. ***Update*** Company contacted me after review and fully refunded my order. Awesome customer service. Also sent me a product of my choice to see if I could have a better experience of their stuff. How nice was that. I got the hand soap, which is very nice, smells wonderful. Therefore adding star.
customer_reviews.author: Wanna be Supermom

customer_reviews.title: Drying, doesn’t rinse well and burns eyes
customer_reviews.text: Oh my word this is not great for baby’s or toddlers and especially not good for hair! It is incredibly drying, doesn’t rinse easily at all and my daughter says it burns her eyes. Will not buy again and wish I hadn’t used both so I could get my money back for one.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Regan

customer_reviews.title: Gentle And Effective
customer_reviews.text: Clear, gentle, suds like crazy. Used as shampoo and facial cleanser in the shower for kids and adults. Rinses clean. No skin irritation. One criticism: Get rid of the pump top. A screw on top with a little raise up spout is way more convenient, takes up less space so you get a little more product and is easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Eisenfeld

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this product. I have a one year old and have been using it since he was about three months. I used quite a few things but nothing helped with his eczema patches and his skin stayed dry. This stuff is amazing for us! I HIGHLY recommend this. I tell all my new mommy friends about it.
customer_reviews.author: DFR1

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: We love Puracy! I quit using puracy for awhile and tried different products available at local stores. It wasn’t long before I switched back. The ingredients in puracy products are just so much better than anything else at this performance level.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L.

customer_reviews.title: Updated post.....
customer_reviews.text: My baby seema to be breaking out from this product...
customer_reviews.author: David jackson

customer_reviews.title: So far we are pleased. We have sensitive skin and are also very ...
customer_reviews.text: My whole family has been using a different baby shampoo/body wash that claimed to be natural but has recently been getting negative reviews and complaints. So we decided to try Puracy, even though it is more expensive than our previous shampoo. So far we are pleased. We have sensitive skin and are also very sensitive to fragrances, and have not had issues with this product so far. The smell is not sweet, but it's pleasant, and not something too fruity which is a plus for the men in the family. Feel is good and it lathers and rinses well. My experience has been positive after about a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: isiwmbiru

customer_reviews.title: Your child's skin will thank you
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is wonderful. We had been using the traditional store-bought baby wash and lotion on my then 1-year old, and she was developing a lot of redness and bumps on her thighs and arms due to dryness from the soap chemicals. The pediatrician prescribed an expensive oil to help, but it did nothing. Then we tried the Puracy baby wash. After only a few days of using this wash and pure jojoba oil as after-bath moisturizer, my daughter's skin was almost completely clear. I use this on myself as well. I definitely recommend this product for your family!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I know it's hard to make all natural soap without a bunch of additives but this one is a fail. It does make suds, but it doesn't make my kids hair smell nice. It does quite the opposite. It also is pretty harsh for their hair. I want to like this product but I've just experienced much better all natural soaps.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: NOT tear free!
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this due to all the positive reviews but it is definitely not tear free. I tried it out first and it burned my eyes horribly. They need to change the formula or stop claiming to be ‘tear free’
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I've been using California Baby for 4 years, but thought I would try something new and was looking for a better price. This is a great deal and the product is great. My girls did fine with it, plenty of bubbles while they're washing. Very light scent. I'll be getting it again!
customer_reviews.author: Shana C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby and adult skin
customer_reviews.text: Both me and my toddler use this for the skin. I also wash her hair with it and she doesn't complain about the soap hurting her eyes. We also use the handsoap from the same brand and use the refill bag to reduce plastic waste. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Carin

customer_reviews.title: Drying for baby's scalp
customer_reviews.text: It has a pleasant smell but is extremely drying. My son developed dandruff using this product. I wanted to like it so bad due to its ingredients but it's not suitable to be used with hard water. I used Aveeno and it wasn't even that bad compared to this shampoo. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smell & lather
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a less expensive, natural option for my child's cleanser and happened upon this Puracy Shampoo & Body Wash. This wash is fantastic! You only need a little bit, 2 pumps is more than sufficient to wash my whole child, and the smell is pleasant. It seems like its tear free formula is accurate, I've never noticed that my toddler gets upset if a little bit of soap gets in his eyes - other than the traditional irritation that something is there. I am so happy I ran across this product!
customer_reviews.author: JStruds2.0

customer_reviews.title: Great product for babies free of harsh chemicals
customer_reviews.text: This all natural shampoo/wash is gentle, has pleasant aroma and the pump makes it easy to use while keeping one hand on baby. We’ve used it for a couple of weeks and it’s perfect so far- doesn’t seem to irritate the baby’s scalp like the previous product we used, the flaking is almost completely gone. Also the price was very good at the time of purchase, $10 off original price. I anticipate the two bottles to last a long time even with daily use!
customer_reviews.author: The Press Room

customer_reviews.title: Stop using Johnson’s!
customer_reviews.text: I did a little research and came across this brand. We’ve been using Johnson’s baby wash since our daughter was born and she had these little bumps across her chest and on her chin/cheeks that felt super dry. Decided to go for it and buy the two pack puracy baby wash and after using it for about 5 days all her bumps are gone! She just feels so much softer and I don’t feel the need to put lotion on her after a bath. Definitely going to buy the normal body wash for myself too!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Best product I have found for my kids!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best! I searched for a long time trying to find a product that would clean my children well and be good for them and the Earth. This shampoo and body wash meets all of those qualifications. I have twin two year olds and a five year old, and we live in the country , so I have tested this product well on dirty kids! Also, two of my children are prone to eczema and skin sensitivities, and this shampoo has not seemed to affect them of adversely. Quick arrival and competitive price with other places I shop. Also, sturdy, spill-proof packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Ann Wilke

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Like the mild fresh fragrance, loved how it lathers when put on a poof, and my boys have never complained about it burning their eyes (so not sure why there are so many reviews with this complaint). Great natural product. I even went back online and ordered a natural cleaning product that this brand makes. Hope I like it as much!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Doman

customer_reviews.title: I also like the fresh smell of it
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this product on both my children who has severe eczema. Their rashes are now less compared to the other shampoo and wash I used on them. I previously used Mustela, Burts Bees, Calendula, Cetaphil, Aveeno and some other products. But this seems to be the only that reduces their rashes. I also like the fresh smell of it. Not too strong. I definitely recommend this to those who are in search of mild gentle shampoo and wash for their kids with skin problems.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Soapy hair
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this from a baby foaming soap. Babyganics I think. The only thing I like less about this is it’s hard to wash out of hair. Takes some scrubbing but goes further than them foam soaps that use up fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jasseu

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap. Have been using this for while now. Never any reaction for a sensitive skin child. Smells good. Lathers good. Only negative is I still have to use skin moisturizer as it might be a bit drying.
customer_reviews.author: Kate S

customer_reviews.title: Not for kids (eyes burn)
customer_reviews.text: As many other reviews stated this does not seem to be tear free. Everytime this is used on toddler, eyes are red and silky hair are gone since we’ve started using this.
customer_reviews.author: Ati

customer_reviews.title: Seems good for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I'm an adult, but I try to find natural baby stuff because my skin can get pretty dry when the seasons change. It's not that easy to find a quality, natural body wash that's not super pricey. So far, I like this brand quite a bit. It doesn't dry out and tighten my skin, doesn't make me itch throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: They Stand by Their Products
customer_reviews.text: We love the Puracy hand soap so I thought we'd like this stuff, too. I wasn't a huge fan, mostly because it didn't lather very well. The company emailed me to see how I liked the product, and I replied and shared my feedback with them. I'll just say that they really stand by their products and I was extremely satisfied with how they handled my being somewhat dissatisfied. We'll continue to buy their soap and may try some other products down the road. I am impressed that they stand by their products.
customer_reviews.author: Brody

customer_reviews.title: but it smells amazing! The packaging was clearly done with care and ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby is due Feb 25th so I haven't had a chance to try this out, but it smells amazing! The packaging was clearly done with care and the bottles were nice and full! Be careful inserting the pump into the bottle because the bottle is literally filled to the top (that is NOT a complaint!) and some spillage is inevitable. I may edit this review once my son arrives and I have a chance to use the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo and body wash is perfect for babies with sensitive skin. It does not have a scent and it truly is tear free. Other products irritated my baby's skin and since we switched her skin is looking better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best out there!
customer_reviews.text: These are best products for my little boys. Works great on sensitive skin and has a light smell that both boys like. Love how soft their hair is afterward. Great line of products but this is by far my most favorite!
customer_reviews.author: AYura

customer_reviews.title: One bittle leaked during delivery
customer_reviews.text: One of the bottles had leaked in the package a bit before delivery and turned into brown goo. It was pretty gross. We did end up using the one that didnt open and it was good for sensitive skin, just how the other turned brown was off putting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love that this shampoo is free of all the harmful ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that this shampoo is free of all the harmful chemicals. It lathers nicely and it's great that it can be used as body wash & shampoo, avoiding the need to have separate products. Both my kids have sensitive skin and neither have had a reaction to Puracy. I highly recommend also getting the lotion. Goes on nicely, not greasy and moisturizers well. After switching to different washes over the years for my kids, I'm sticking with Puracy.
customer_reviews.author: VSM

customer_reviews.title: Causes eczema flair ups for us
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed in this order. I saw all of the wonderful reviews and thought I’d give it a try for my daughter who has mild eczema. I thought I was imagining things but last night it was confirmed. Every time I use it she becomes very itchy. I’ve since switched to something else, but last night we tried it on her, and her eczematic spots inevitably become itchy/flare up when we use it. We have a bunch of bottles and I’ll try to pawn them off on my husband, but we definitely won’t be using them on my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Alison DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it, parents happy.
customer_reviews.text: We loved the product and it’s not expensive. Only thing the pump that you install on the bottle is very flimsy and will break easily. Gotta be more durable guys, dealing with babies and parents it’s gotta be rugged and rough. Tested on all terrains.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product. My oldest son has eczema and this shampoo and wash does not irritate his skin. It is truly tear free and the scent is wonderful. His skin is left feeling soft and clean. Burt’s Bees always irritates my son’s eyes. Puracy is the best and much more reasonably priced than Burt’s.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hildebrand

customer_reviews.title: Great scent, price/ounce is good.
customer_reviews.text: Nice light citrus scent, no 'bad stuff', and doesn't hurt my scalp psoriasis. I'm a huge fan of Ava Anderson products, but also use other brands that have taken out the sulfates, parabens, "fragrance" mystery, etc. The price per ounce on this is good (for the toxin minimizing brands). And, it doesn't smell like lavender. For me, that is HUGE. So far, my scalp hurts less. I also use Ava's Diaper/Dream Cream (no comparable brand elsewhere in that format). I also got some of the adult Puracy Body Wash- and the scent in that is also nice.
customer_reviews.author: JillinoisRNTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Miracle product
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. After just one night of using it, my kids’ skin improved. Our 2-year old, who’s been having skin problems for the longest time with eczema and other types of rashes, had the softest skin the next day. His skin just cleared up and it wasn’t crazy dry anymore. And even his rashes just started to disappear or heal, whatever you wanna call it. I highly recommend this brand and product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the product. It makes bathing with my child much easier and enjoyable. No residual scent or anything, and feels very clean after taking bath with it. Compared to Honest, I recommend this one as a better product.
customer_reviews.author: whalemeal

customer_reviews.title: Definitely on my subscription list
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with the pump not popping open so I emailed vendor directly. They sent instruction and everything worked out. The wash is very gentle on my baby’s skin. Tried to save some $ and bought Honest Co from Costco. Bad choice. My 14 month old started getting tiny bumps on his skin. He literally feels scaly. Definitely switching back to Puracy and subscribing
customer_reviews.author: CKC

customer_reviews.title: I decided to look online and am glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I'm 77 years old living in a desert climate and I've been looking for such a product.. The list of ingredients is very healthy and my skin feels clean and soft. This is important because I'm a swimmer and need something gentle and effective to wash off the chemicals in the pool. Thank you for putting the list of reasons for using the product on the side which are brief and to the point. I've tried the other major baby product but gave up because of the artificial fragrance which lingered on my skin. In desperation, I decided to look online and am glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: dd

customer_reviews.title: Great for Baby
customer_reviews.text: We've used this on our newborn just a couple of times but I've been very happy with it so far. Not super sudsy, just enough so you can see that it is doing something (as opposed to some natural soaps where you have to use a ton to feel clean because they don't spread well and aren't sudsy.) My baby feels clean and soft afterwards. I do not notice any soapy residue on his skin after and the smell is pleasant. He just smells clean not fragrant. Feel much better using this over Johnson and Johnson. I couldn't bare using that on his new skin. Will probably continue to buy this product as long as he needs it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the one
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, I have been looking for an alternative ever since Kiss My Face changed their formula. Imagine if you would a tall, muscular, bald guy with a beard. Sounds pretty tough right? Tell that to my skin. This stuff leaves me squeaky clean without irritating my skin or leaving a weird residue. Is it more expensive than brand-name soap, absolutely. It it worth it, definitely. I genuinely hope that this company continues to grow and doesn't change their formula or sell out to some mega corporation that will indubitably mess things up.
customer_reviews.author: MLavore

customer_reviews.title: I love the all natural ingredients and it does not burn ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my toddler and use it for my 7 year old too! I love the all natural ingredients and it does not burn sensitive baby eyes and skin. IT works well for hair, body and face. It is a clear liquid, and you dont need to use too much. There isn't a lot of lathering bubbles, but it is not necessary. It works great and I plan to buy it again. I finally found something I like in Puracy, after going thru Babyganics (no good), Aveeno (no good), and being unable to obtain Yes to Carrots baby foaming wash on Amazon any longer. Puracy comes in a 2 pack and the price is reasonable. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Beauty Girl

customer_reviews.title: “Tear-free” .... YMMV
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased several bottles of this in the past, but there may be a quality-control issue: this latest bottle definitely stings the eyes! My 18-month-old screams bloody murder at every bath time now, no matter how careful I am not to get this in his eyes. In a pinch, during travel , I’ve used “adult” soaps in his hair before. Most (if you’re careful) don’t cause tears — and not a one has ever caused the pained reaction this one has. Without the consistency in quality, I’m done. I just can’t risk another purchase when the outcome causes my son physical pain!
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to find a better shampoo for my young boys without all the harsh chemicals and junk. This is great. It smells great and my boys are happy with it. The pump feature is easy for them to use and for me if I'm helping my younger one. I feel a lot better about using this shampoo on my boys than any other ones I've found on the market. Although a lot of more "natural" shampoos exist for adults, it's much harder finding ones for children. I will definitely be ordering this again when our bottles get low!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff for my boys with very sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff for my boys with very sensitive skin. My youngest can get eczema, but this has soap has kept him from having any outbreaks this winter. A lot of times these make their hair feel less than clean, but this is great on their hair and skin. Plus we all like the scent. And we are a family with strong opinions on scents so that is saying a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Eliz

customer_reviews.title: Very Drying
customer_reviews.text: This stuff dries out my toddlers hair. We've used several other shampoos in the past and it's never been this dried out before. Awful stuff. Not sure where all the reviews are coming from.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! It is the perfect baby shampoo and body wash, tear free, natural, and I feel good about what I’m putting on my baby. I also use it on myself! Love this and will be ordering it again. It comes with two bottles so that’s fabulous. Lasts a long time! We also use the baby lotion and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product! Smells great, does not irritate my daughter’s sensitive skin, and lasts a long time. I’m still on my first bottle because it suds up so well! Will definitely buy again once I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for eczema prone skin!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing we use on our kids who suffer from severe eczema and dry skin. They love it cause it smells great and we love it cause it’s not irritating and doesn’t give them flare ups.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Pak

customer_reviews.title: Awful smell and drying
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love the lavender lotion by the same company but this soap is drying and has the most awful scent! It smells really chemically. We have opened one of the bottles and so can’t return but I’m sad two bottles will go to waste. Would not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: DDG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for babies and kids
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite baby wash product and I have tried quite a few. Use it for my three year old son and three with old baby girl. Very happy with it. I myself love to use it as a body wash.
customer_reviews.author: Olha

customer_reviews.title: Poor hand pump for products
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the product in the bottle. The only complaint i have about the product is that the pumps that come with it suck. I purchased a box of 2 soaps and both pumps that came with it wouldnt pump the soap. It became very annoying to try to bathe a couple month old baby.
customer_reviews.author: golfergirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for cradle cap
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to alleviate my infant's cradle cap. She has a lot of hair and this shampoo quickly cleared it up. Her hair also stayed clean much longer than with other shampoos I had used. The light citrus scent is lovely and I have started using it as a shampoo and body wash for both my children. My infant also has eczema and I haven't had any issues with her skin.
customer_reviews.author: Epistaxis

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for little ones
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of this product and the fact that it is so conscientious. I wish it did come in a more moisturizing formula but I just follow up with lotion
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is not tear free!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this natural shampoo/body wash for my son. It smells good, cleans well BUT it is NOT tear free. My son screamed "mommy help me" when it got in his eyes. My husband and I have both purposely put Puracy soap in our eyes to try it and it does sting very bad!! It upsets me that Puracy claims that it is tear free but it is clearly not. Makes me wonder if their products really are natural. I did want to try their lotion but because of this issue I will not be purchasing anymore Puracy products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: As a mother of four young children with very sensitive skin - I can safely say this product is superb for all children and adults! I can't say enough positive things about it - it smells great, rinses very clean and makes an excellent bubble bath too!
customer_reviews.author: T.M.Clark

customer_reviews.title: The best soap I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: After lots of reading trying to pick a soap for my daughter I decided on this one and I'm very happy with it! I have very sensitive skin and can't use a lot of products and was worried she would have the same problem but this doesnt bother her skin or mine and I couldnt be happier with it! It has a nice soft smell, bubbles well unlike other sensitive soaps I've tried and a little definitely goes a long way. Our whole house now uses puracy and I'm very excited to try other products by them
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Mama's need this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Puracy brand before and fell in love. Right after my daughter was born I wanted an all natural and sensitive laundry detergent. I gave this brand a try and I have nothing bad to say about them!! I love this baby shampoo I purchased! The smell isn't heavy it's very clean and refreshing. The only thing I do notice that I would change is if they added some kind of conditioner into it. My baby's hair doesnt feel soft in the bath but once it dries it's silky. I recommend this to every mama!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
